content: Formulate a list of 20 words that contain 'ough'.

Sure! Here are 20 words that contain "ough":

1. Though
2. Thought
3. Through
4. Thorough
5. Tough
6. Enough
7. Bough
8. Cough
9. Drought
10. Hiccough
11. Lough
12. Sough
13. Sought
14. Rough
15. Slough
16. Toughen
17. Bought
18. Dough
19. Gough
20. Hough

I hope this helps! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask.
